newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - Loctite, Big B up.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - Loctite, Big B up.

text.p: Shares in Big B Inc and Loctite Corp traded higher preceding Monday's market open, both issues buoyed by merger-related news.
Big B shares rose to 17-1/8 ahead of the opening bell from 16-9/16 after it announced its board unanimously approved Revco D.S Inc's $17.25 per share takeover bid.
Revco shares were unmoved before the open, traders said.

Meanwhile, Loctite shares were bid at 56-5/8 -- 10-5/8 points above Friday's market close -- after Germany-based Henkel said it intends to buy for $56 per share the roughly 65 percent of Loctite it does not already own.
Henkel said it offered over the weekend to start talks with Loctite to assemble a friendly agreement, and added that if such talks failed to progress, a public takeover bid would beconsidered.
Shares in Acclaim Entertainment Inc are expected to fall sharply at the market open after the company announced that it expects to lose at least $140 million in the fiscal fourth quarter.
Acclaim also said a loss for fiscal year 1996 will significantly exceed market expectations.
The shares were bid at 4-5/8, 5/8 under Friday's close.
